snippet: A premiere screening of "Tiger Eyes," a film adaptation of the novel by the New Jersey native and directed by her son, Lawrence Blume, is among the Garden State-centric events planned for the first Montclair Film Festival.
abstract: A premiere screening of "Tiger Eyes," a film adaptation of the novel by the New Jersey native and directed by her son, Lawrence Blume, is among the Garden State-centric events planned for the first Montclair Film Festival.

headline.main: Lineup Unveiled for Inaugural Montclair Film Festival
headline.print_headline: Montclair Film Festival Unveils Its Lineup
